title: Broadway at a Discount- What's Available at TKTS for September 23, 2015!
content: Main   Theater&Dance TKTS has been a New York City institution for decades, bringing theatre-goers a last-minute way to get tickets for some of Broadway's hottest shows at a discount. TDF operates three TKTS Discount Booths in New York City- Times Square, South Street Seaport, and Brooklyn. Looking for affordable tickets for tonight, September 23, 2015 BroadwayWorld brings you the full list of what's available today…
